item.title: Spring Boot Access MySQL Database with Spring Data JPA
item.description: Introduction In this tutorial we walk you through step by step to create a Spring Boot application to access MySQL database using Spring Data JPA and MySQL Driver. Via step by step example we will create a Spring Boot project to save Customer entity into customer data table in MySQL database. Create New Spring Boot Project From Spring Tool Suite IDE select menu File > New > Spring Starter Project.
